TOKENSAYS.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this saying?
TOKENSAYS.parameters:
Accepts paramter values:
   [@alias]=token name
   [@actor]=actor name
   [@item]=item name.
   Add r_ to the start of any of the above for response details e.g. [@r_alias].
TOKENSAYS.separator: Accepts multiple entries delimited by your settings separator.

setting.audioDuration.label: Audio Maximum Duration
setting.audioDuration.description: Set a maximum duration (in seconds) for any audio tracks played by Token Says. Helps prevent long running audio.
setting.condition.description: A list of condition names (e.g. Unconscious) that will prevent a saying from generating for a token if that token has this condition or effect enabled. Separate each entry in the list with a pipe |
setting.condition.label: Cancel Conditions
setting.cacheAudio.description: Preloads audio files for active sayings with a specified file path or playlist track that are associated with any tokens on the scene at the time of scene load. Does not cache audio for sayings that generate audio randomly from a playlist.
setting.cacheAudio.label: Preload Audio on Scene Load
setting.defaultAudioCompendium.label: Default Playlist Compendium
setting.defaultAudioCompendium.description: This is the compendium that will be accessed by default when determining where the saying's audio file is stored. Individual sayings may override this default.
setting.defaultRollableTableCompendium.label: Default Rollable Table Compendium
setting.defaultRollableTableCompendium.descripti: This is the compendium that will be accessed by default when determining where the saying's rolltable is stored. Individual sayings may override this default.
setting.isActive.label: Activate Token Says
setting.isActive.description: Activates all of the active token says sayings for this world.
setting.rules.label: Sayings
setting.rules.description: A list of all sayings entered for this world.
setting.separator.label: Separator
setting.separator.description: When used in text inputs, allows for multiple entries within the same form field. Use this as the separator between each entry (e.g. goblin|hobgoblin|bugbear). Currently supported in Token Name input box on the saying form.

say.actions.label: Provoking Action
say.cap.description: Plays the sound for the length of time that the token is moving.
say.cap.label: Only While Moving
say.compendiumName.label: Compendium
say.compendiumName.description.audio: The compendium that holds the playlist. Leave blank to use your default (compendium or world). Note that audio played from a compendium may be slow to load.
say.compendiumName.description.rolltable: The compendium that holds the rollable table. Leave blank to use your default (compendium or world). Note that tables rolled from a compendium may be slow to return a result.
say.delay.label: Delay (ms)
say.documentName.label: Action Name
say.documentName.description: If left blank, the saying will generate for any action of this type.
say.documentType.label: Action Type
say.fileTitle.label: Token Says
say.fileTitle.description.audio:
If playlist is blank, enter the path to the audio file to play here.
If playlist has a value, then enter the name of the track to play in the playlist here. Leave this field blank in order to shuffle the playlist.
say.fileTitle.description.rolltable: The token always says this. If a value is entered here then this will bypass rolling on the rollable table.
say.isActive.label: Active
say.isActorName.label: Use Actor Name
say.isActorName.description: Matches on the 'Token Name' using the triggering token's actor name instead of it's token name.
say.label.label: Title
say.language.label: Language
say.likelihood.label: Likelihood
say.likelihood.description: The percent likelihood that the token will say this when the provoking action is triggered.
say.maxDistance.label: Within Distance
say.name.label: Token Name
say.reacts.description: Identify the action and the other token, if applicable, that this token will respond to. Choose if other token must be in this token's sight (center-based) and at what distance. In terms of Distance, a value of 0 = infinite.
say.reacts.label: Responds To
say.requireVision.label: Only if in Sight
say.source.label: Source
say.suppress.label: Suppress
say.token.label: Token Speaking
say.suppressChatbubble.label: Chat Bubble
say.suppressChatMessage.label: Chat Message
say.suppressQuotes.label: Quotes
say.trigger.label: Trigger
say.volume.label: Volume
say.warning.dupNames.label: The responding token and the token being responded to share the same name. Though no token will respond to itself, this may result in a snowballing of responses, depending on how many tokens with this name are on the scene.

setting.suppressPrivateGMRoles.label: Suppress Token Says on Private GM Rolls
setting.suppressPrivateGMRoles.description: Token Says will not be invoked when a roll is made in Private GM Role mode.
setting.suppressChatBubble.label: Suppress Token Says Chat Bubbles
setting.suppressChatBubble.description: Stops Token Says chat bubbles triggered by your actions from invoking on tokens for the given saying configuration types.
setting.suppressChatMessage.label: Suppress Token Says Chat Messages
setting.suppressChatMessage.description: Stops Token Says messages triggered by your actions from displaying in the chat log for the given saying configuration types.
setting.suppressImage.label: Suppress Chat Message Image
setting.suppressImage.description: Speaker image will not show in chat message. May be necessary to suppress this should you have another module that adds an image.
setting.suppressAudio.label: Suppress Token Says Audio
setting.suppressAudio.description: Stops Token Says audio triggered by your actions from invoking.
setting.worldRollableTableInd.label: Search World's Rollable Tables First
setting.worldRollableTableInd.description: Activate this if you want Token Says to first browse the rollable tables in this world for the specified table name in the saying (and use this instead) before performing a compendium search.
setting.worldAudioInd.label: Search World's Playlists First
setting.worldAudioInd.description: Activate this if you want Token Says to first browse the audio playlists in this world for the specified audio file in the saying (and use this instead) before performing a compendium search.

display.label: Display Button in Token Form Header
display.description: Determine if and how to show a button in the token and prototype token form headers. This button will launch the 'Config Token Sayings' form with the sayings filtered to that token's name.

setting.tokenSaysRules.name: Configure Token Sayings
setting.tokenSaysRules.label: Open Sayings
setting.tokenSaysRule.name: Configure Saying
setting.export.title: Export Token Sayings

import.error: failed import due to invalid data
import.noFile: You did not upload a data file!
import.skipped: skipped because id is duplicate of an existing saying.
import.title: Import Token Sayings

warning.actor-not-found: The follow actor names were not found in this world:
warning.token-not-found: The following token names were not found in any scene in this world:
warning.rollable-table-not-found: A rollable table with this name does not exist in this world or the associated compendium:
warning.playlist-not-found: A playlist with this name does not exist in this world or the associated compendium:
